source_sentence: 二釋分五如論　十一明離邪見德分五如論　十二明離怖畏德　十三明加行究竟作意分位　十四明加行究竟果作意分位　十五明總結　十六明地義分三。
translation: He explains them in five parts as in the discussion. xi. showing the virtue of freedom from wrong views in five parts as in the discussion. xii. showing the virtue of freedom from fear. xiii. showing the stage of contemplation of the ultimate effect of applied practices. xiv. showing the stage of contemplation of the ultimate result of applied practices. xv. summarizing. xvi. explaining the meaning of the grounds in three parts.
One is an indication.
Second, he explains the three established metaphors.
